name: Re-Pong - 1972
description:
Re-pong - 1927

A re-make of Pong, as part of the History of Games Challenge.

Instructions:

Win ConditionFirst to 11 pointsPlayer 1 ControlsW / SPlayer 2 ControlsUp / DownTwist on the original gamePaddles get smaller when they hit the ball.

The History of Games Challenge

For every year from 1972 onwards, make a clone of a game (or a game's mechanics) that came out that year. Additionally, add a new mechanic or twist to the original design.

The intent of this challenge is to freshen up my game development skills and force me to improve my pixel art.
